about_the_game:
An original defensive 4X strategy game. In the game, you will play the role of the leader of a civilization by choosing appropriate characteristics, using resources to develop technology, planning goals for your people and gradually building into a larger city. In the process, you will also raise your civilization's own heroes to defend your city against the tide of greedy enemies and lead your civilization to a brighter future. I believe that when you utilize your own carefully chosen strategy to get through the process of winning more with less, it will bring you the most unique gaming experience.



Each time you play, you will generate a unique world, choose the direction of the Council from the different styles of civilization characteristics, and appoint heroes and characters from different fields to help the development of civilization, so that every game you play will be a new experience.



You will experience first-hand which famous defensive wars in history in campaign mode, using your limited resources as a commander to fend off a huge number of enemies, and using your strategy to outmaneuver ancient generals and win the battle! (This gameplay will be continuously updated.)



Recruit a variety of heroes and let them grow with your civilization. There are even limited heroes that are unique to this era to help you defend against foreign enemies and achieve greatness!



A newborn civilization always has to face the test of times, not to mention that this is a world surrounded by powerful enemies. You will find the way to develop under the crisis and try to guard your civilization from eight batches of powerful attacks. With a variety of difficulty levels, you'll be challenged to complete an ever-escalating level!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In history, many brilliant civilizations faced annihilation due to the invasion of powerful empires, leaving only sighs of regret. In a fictional world, you will take on the role Guardian of Civilization. Can you help these civilizations grow and thrive, resisting the invasion of formidable enemies?
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
